conclusion: Analyze the path of the liquid from each starting point (A, B, and C) and follow the trajectory through the baffles.
Liquid starts at point A, positioned above the black baffle.
Black baffle is angled downwards towards the left side of the image.
Liquid will hit the black baffle and flow downwards and to the left.
After black baffle, liquid encounters the yellow baffle.
Yellow baffle is angled downwards towards the right side of the image.
Liquid will hit the yellow baffle and flow downwards and to the right.
Liquid will reach the bottom section and flow into container E.
Liquid starts at point B, positioned above the purple baffle.
Purple baffle is angled downwards towards the right side of the image.
Liquid will hit the purple baffle and flow downwards and to the right.
After purple baffle, liquid encounters the cyan baffle.
Cyan baffle is angled downwards towards the left side of the image.
Liquid will hit the cyan baffle and flow downwards and to the left.
Liquid will reach the bottom section and flow into container D.
Liquid starts at point C, positioned above the pink baffle.
Pink baffle is angled downwards towards the left side of the image.
Liquid will hit the pink baffle and flow downwards and to the left.
After pink baffle, liquid encounters the cyan baffle.
Cyan baffle is angled downwards towards the left side of the image.
Liquid will hit the cyan baffle and continue flowing downwards and to the left.
Liquid will reach the bottom section and flow into container F.
Liquid from A will flow into container E.
Liquid from B will flow into container D.
